author: BitterSweet#1337
description: Parse through trusted rom sites for all those games you want.
install_msg:
RomDom is a rom searching and util cog, use `[p]rom querey` for search.
If you need help or anything please join my server: https://discord.com/invite/ChS8MZDPRA
short: Search safe rom sites like Vimm's Lair.
